description:
In this session, we analyze the Django Framework from a hacker's perspective, exploring how real-world hacking techniques could be applied to Django. We also share practical methods to use Django more securely. This talk will be valuable not only for developers using Django but also for anyone interested in security.

Seokchan Yoon
Hello! I am an active developer and security professional, deeply involved in various tech communities. Currently, I am focusing on development productivity and security, with a special interest in researching Django. Nice to meet you!

related_urls.label: A Hacker's Perspective on Django Framework - PyCon Korea 2024

title: A Hacker's Perspective on Django Framework - Seokchan Yoon [PyCon.KR 2024]
